comments:
I have a class (PrologProcess) that implements IProcess. It returns null for 
the getStreamsProxy() call. The documentation for IProcess says to return null 
if there is no streams proxy. When the PrologProcess is added to the launch 
passed to the DebugTarget (by calling launch.addProcess(prologProcess)), 2 
identical null pointer errors are generated in the .log file:

!MESSAGE Problems occurred when invoking code from plug-
in: "org.eclipse.debug.core".
